channel.title: These pictures work well in a little game?
channel.description:
Do you think these little monster dudes would work well in a game? Note that they will not actually be moving different parts of the picture, just the whole picture floatin' after the little skeleton dude. The skeleton dude is the person trying to kill these wittle peoples. Also, the background is transparent on these...
[IMG]http://i129.photobucket.com/albums/p215/zachandnikki/Alien_Game_Picture_Revolver.gif[/img]
